title: Paytm COO Bhavesh Gupta resigns; set to become adviser to CEO office
description: Bhavesh Gupta, Chief Operating Officer (COO) and President of One 97 Communications (OCL), the parent company of the Paytm brand, has resigned. The fintech firm announced this to stock exchanges on Saturday. Gupta will shift to an advisory role at the office of Paytm CEO Vijay Shekhar Sharma by the end of this month.
